After [renaming GlobaLID to TerraLID](20240414_Kick-off.qmd), today marks the launch of the [TerraLID webpage](https://terralid.org/) more information about TerraLID and current updates about the project wrapped into a new look. Follow us there to stay informed about developments in the project, such as the launch of the community feedback phase for the [TerraLID metadata profile](https://metadata.terralid.org/latest/)! 

If you subscribed to our RSS feed, please do not forget to update the link to <https://terralid.org/blog.xml> to receive the latest updates. 

The GlobaLID page remains online for archival reasons until further notice.
